question: What is the name of the former External affairs Minister of India, who has recently passed away?
explanation:
Former Union Minister of India and one of the founding members of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP), Jaswant Singh passed away at the age of 82.
During his three-decade long political career, the leader had held several positions including Union minister for Defence and External affairs. He also served as the Minister for Electronics and Minister for surface transport.
